basics.name: German Velibekov
basics.label: Senior Mobile Developer
basics.summary: I am a Software Developer with eight years of experience, who has proven background in designing and implementing complex apps and systems. I have expert knowledge of the SW development life cycle, including design, coding, testing, debugging, deployment and maintenance. I'm highly self-organized, with a proven ability to handle full SW development/release cycle, and particularly passionate about app architectures and automation of work processes. I'm keen on sharing my knowledge with the rest of the programming community through articles on Medium , as well as contributing to the open source projects on GitHub. I'm a quick learner with a thirst to expand my already vast knowledge, and I excel at conceptualizing and implementing new and innovative ideas to help organisations reach their goals.

work.summary: Leading an iOS development as part of a technical team, providing a cross-application solutions across the bank products and successfully integrating it into existing systems.
highlights: - Creating a full documented iOS framework from scratch, including automated release cycle
- Writing technical articles related to Swift language and iOS development
- Open-sourcing part of the solutions created during the development process
- Consulting other teams for their products across the company

- Refactored the whole user authentication process into one easy-to-use SDK. Now, any applicaiton using auth doesn't have to deal with a complexity of the authentication process, but only integrate the newly created SDK and call its API

work.summary: Acted as technical lead for the development of an enterprise level framework for pipelining of application customization for different customers. Lead the development of solution architecture of main company product.
highlights: - Led the architecture and development of a new framework that replaced all old libraries with a robust overarching library for the entire project
- Worked on in-house Native iOS app-extension (keyboard) for mobile banking
- Reduced time to customize a full product from month to 2.5 weeks

work.summary: Developed the company flagship product and managed a small team of developers, including training new starters, allocating tasks, determining project timeframes, conducting performance reviews, and motivating the team to meet deadlines and achieve higher quality results.
highlights: - Delivering high-quality client-side application features on time to customers, taking full responsibility for the development lifecycle

- Wrote code, investigated new technologies and approaches, developed new features, and worked closely with all relevant parties to achieve full understanding of business needs, objectives, challenges and limitations
- Coordinated Sprint assignments and directed weekly team meetings to monitor progress and set direction for best results
- Leading the team to a successful release of application first beta version to App Store
- Developing key selling features of the application
- Major code refactoring dividing Backend call layer into Front-end microservices
- Released a first version of the app to the App Store

work.summary: Contributed to a key organisation products and created multiple mobile applications from zero, taking role of a leading mobile developer in company. Created main workflows inside the mobile department, as part of a constant and productive work with clients.
highlights: - Developed iOS and Android versions of an enterprise mobile application for secure login, which was installed on employeesâ€™ devices to act as multi-factor authentication for Skype for Business suite
- Developed a mobile application which formed part of flagship product - SphereShield
- Developed an iPad application for Car Rent services - WeMakeIt
- Developed an iOS & Android native applications for digitally signing documents using Bluetooth card reader for user authentication
- Developed a mobile application which formed part of flagship product - SphereShield
- Integrated leading MDM vendors SDKs into application client side, enabling access-based device security restrictions and blocking access for non-compliant devices
- Managed relationships with vendors' (MobileIron, Citrix) support teams
- Developed a cross-platform mobile application for providing useful information to citizens abroad
- Contributed to development of TopoMap & ShvilNet navigation mobile applications
- Developed In-App Purcahse features into TopoMap and Shvilnet apps which increased income from the App Store.
- WeMakeIt application was successfully distributed across numerous amount of companies. It led to contract extension with the client and a vast income for the company.
- The digital-sign app was the first of its kind, and served as a proof for technological capability of smart-ID digital signature on smartphones.
